mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure all interactive elements are easily tappable on mobile devices, and optimize for different screen sizes.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and leverage browser caching to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more relevant meta tags, optimize page titles, and include alt text for all images to improve SEO.

bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking steps and ensure there are clear calls-to-action at every stage of the process.
